1.text: And Jehovah spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,

2.text: The children of Israel shall encamp every man by his own standard, with the ensigns of their fathers’ houses: over against the tent of meeting shall they encamp round about.

3.text: And those that encamp on the east side toward the sunrising shall be they of the standard of the camp of Judah, according to their hosts: and the prince of the children of Judah shall be Nahshon the son of Amminadab.

4.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were threescore and fourteen thousand and six hundred.

5.text: And those that encamp next unto him shall be the tribe of Issachar: and the prince of the children of Issachar shall be Nethanel the son of Zuar.

6.text: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and four thousand and four hundred.

7.text: And the tribe of Zebulun: and the prince of the children of Zebulun shall be Eliab the son of Helon.

8.text: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred.

9.text: All that were numbered of the camp of Judah were a hundred thousand and fourscore thousand and six thousand and four hundred, according to their hosts. They shall set forth first.

10.text: On the south side shall be the standard of the camp of Reuben according to their hosts: and the prince of the children of Reuben shall be Elizur the son of Shedeur.

11.text: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were forty and six thousand and five hundred.

12.text: And those that encamp next unto him shall be the tribe of Simeon: and the prince of the children of Simeon shall be Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.

13.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were fifty and nine thousand and three hundred.

14.text: And the tribe of Gad: and the prince of the children of Gad shall be Eliasaph the son of Reuel.

15.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were forty and five thousand and six hundred and fifty.

16.text: All that were numbered of the camp of Reuben were a hundred thousand and fifty and one thousand and four hundred and fifty, according to their hosts. And they shall set forth second.

17.text: Then the tent of meeting shall set forward, with the camp of the Levites in the midst of the camps: as they encamp, so shall they set forward, every man in his place, by their standards.

18.text: On the west side shall be the standard of the camp of Ephraim according to their hosts: and the prince of the children of Ephraim shall be Elishama the son of Ammihud.

19.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were forty thousand and five hundred.

20.text: And next unto him shall be the tribe of Manasseh: and the prince of the children of Manasseh shall be Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.

21.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were thirty and two thousand and two hundred.

22.text: And the tribe of Benjamin: and the prince of the children of Benjamin shall be Abidan the son of Gideoni.

23.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were thirty and five thousand and four hundred.

24.text: All that were numbered of the camp of Ephraim were a hundred thousand and eight thousand and a hundred, according to their hosts. And they shall set forth third.

25.text: On the north side shall be the standard of the camp of Dan according to their hosts: and the prince of the children of Dan shall be Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai.

26.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were threescore and two thousand and seven hundred.

27.text: And those that encamp next unto him shall be the tribe of Asher: and the prince of the children of Asher shall be Pagiel the son of Ochran.

28.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were forty and one thousand and five hundred.

29.text: And the tribe of Naphtali: and the prince of the children of Naphtali shall be Ahira the son of Enan.

30.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.

31.text: All that were numbered of the camp of Dan were a hundred thousand and fifty and seven thousand and six hundred. They shall set forth hindmost by their standards.

32.text: These are they that were numbered of the children of Israel by their fathers’ houses: all that were numbered of the camps according to their hosts were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty.

33.text: But the Levites were not numbered among the children of Israel; as Jehovah commanded Moses.

34.text: Thus did the children of Israel; according to all that Jehovah commanded Moses, so they encamped by their standards, and so they set forward, every one by their families, according to their fathers’ houses.
